img.alt: A collage of staff and students working online, video calling, and encouraging/serving each other
A collage of students receiving their free curbside meals
Smiling elementary and Pre-K students in class
A collage of students with their teacher, two students playing, two students posing together, and a group of women in cultural attire
A collage of two students reading, a parent/teacher conference, and a teacher welcoming a student to class
A collage of a teacher helping a student learn patterns, a student air-brushing a piece, and students making banana batteries with their teacher

span.a: Attend our virtual teacher job fair

div.p: We invite all teachers to join us on May 4 for a chance to speak directly with campus principals, potential interviews and more.
We will be providing Meningitis vaccinations every Wednesday for students attending college or taking dual credit.
Join Guidance and Counseling for answers to college questions at their Virtual Money Monday college interviews.
The U.S. census plays an important part in funding our schools and community. Be sure to participate in the survey so everyone is counted.

span.a: Choose the right school for you

div.p: Let us help you find the school and programs that match your interests.
Anonymous Alerts® is a tool you can use to report urgent student concerns to school officials.
The Newsroom is your one-stop shop for news, photos, tweets, videos & external news media coverage for GISD.

span.a: Show GISD educators your appreciation on social media

div.div: Post a short thank you video on Twitter or Facebook, including #GISDAlwaysConnected, #TeachersCan and #ThankATeacher.

span.a: District high schools named nation’s best

div.div: Garland, Lakeview Centennial, North Garland, Rowlett and Sachse high schools are among the top 40 percent of nearly 18,000 campuses ranked by U.S. News & World Report.

span.a: Surprise announcement awards top district honors

div.div: Chelsea Burch, Shannon Cunningham, Christi Davis, Brenda Martinez and Kiri Richardson were named GISD's 2020 Paraprofessionals and Teachers of the Year.

span.a: Garland ISD partners with DART, Good Samaritans of Garland to provide meals

div.div: Garland ISD has partnered with Dallas Area Rapid Transit and Good Samaritans of Garland to provide a week's worth of meals for district families in need.
Parent University: Family time (Spanish presentation)Las familias pueden unirse a la conversación en español en Facebook en Vivo sobre el tiempo en familia.
School Lunch Hero DayCelebrate the 8th annual School Lunch Hero Day
CANCELED: Spring LuncheonJoin us for our annual Spring Luncheon held by our Garland ISD Council of PTAs.
CANCELED: Tools and Tips, Self-help and Social SkillsA special education parent workshop about independence and social engagement.
Decision Day 2020Let's celebrate our student's educational decisions.
National Teacher Appreciation Week Join us in celebrating our dedicated educators in person or on social media during National Teacher Appreciation Week. #ThankATeacher

div.p: Access live and archived videos of meetings held by the Board of Trustees.

hr.p: Check out our video collection and be inspired by staff and students.
See the Financial Transparency page to learn more about district finances.
GARLAND ISD ADOPTED A TAX RATE THAT WILL RAISE MORE TAXES FOR MAINTENACE AND OPERATIONS THAN LAST YEAR’S TAX RATE.

img.alt: G I S D 2014 Bond construction update site

div.div: Visit our construction status website to stay informed of bond program progress and upcoming contracts available for bid.

img.alt: The Future is Bright

div.div: Providing an exceptional education is the foundation of Garland ISD’s success. View our strategic design process to see how we are planning for a bright future.

img.alt: College for All

div.div: We have paved the way for our students to graduate with more than just a high school diploma. Learn about our College for All focus.

div.p: The Garland Independent School District exists as a diverse community with a shared vision that serves to provide an exceptional education to all its students.
